description:
Big sister of http://anidb.net/ch8166 [Miyano Shiho] aka http://anidb.net/ch8165 [Haibara Ai]. Both of them work(ed) for the http://anidb.net/ch8215 [Kuro no Soshiki].
Akemi uses the alias of Hirota Masami when she is forced to take on a job in a bank in order for the organisation to rob it later. After Conan revealed his real identity to her, she gives him the first big clues about his condition. She dies moments later.
name: Miyano Akemi
